DOC.brief_title: A Multi-component Intervention Improving Fruit Vegetable Consumption Teenagers Their Mothers
DOC.detailed_description: This study longitudinal control trial design investigate effectiveness multi-component intervention improve fruit vegetable consumption teenager mother . Participants allocate three group ) intervention group mother child receive intervention questionnaire , b ) child receive intervention mother child receive questionnaire , c ) mother child active control group receive questionnaire . The intervention package contain behavior change technique target outcome expectancy , self-efficacy , action planning , cop planning , self-monitoring . The active control group receive information sheet regard recommendation fruit vegetable intake . There 3 assessment point time , 1 month . All intervention material information sheet hand participant baseline assessment . The self-monitoring calendar collect time 2 assessment . The primary outcome study estimate dyadic mechanism mother child regard improve fruit vegetable intake . Secondary outcome investigate whether fruit vegetable consumption improve intervention group general also find psychological mechanism behind change time study .
DOC.criteria: They involve nutritional education Ability understand Persian language Adolescents attend high school Qazvin Does meet inclusion criterion
